import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Booking = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', checkIn: '', checkOut: '', guests: 1, roomType: 'standard', specialRequests: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the data to your backend console.log('Booking submitted:', formData); // Add success message or redirect }; return (
